bio: Keynote Speaker, Futurist, Author & Blogger, Strategist, Idea Curator, Occasional Heretic, CEO of The Futures Agency, Founder of Green Futurists, Visiting Professor at Fundacao Dom Cabral (Brazil). @gleonhard on Twitter, Facebook & Youtube. Based in Switzerland (and to be found in airline lounges around the world:) Berklee College of Music, University of Bonn The Futures Agency CEO CEO
